```html
// app.sass 

brand-primary= blue 

.container 
    color= !brand-primary 
    margin= 0px auto 
    padding= 20px 

=border-radius(!radius) 
    -webkit-border-radius= !radius 
    -moz-border-radius= !radius 
    border-radius= !radius 

* 
    +border-radius(0px) 

```

```html
ionic start -a "Example 13" -i app.example.thirteen example13 tabs 
--v2

```

```html
<ion-content padding> 
    <button ion-button color="purple">A Purple Button</button> 
</ion-content>

```

```html
$colors: ( 
  primary:    red, 
  secondary:  #32db64, 
  danger:     #f53d3d, 
  light:      #f4f4f4, 
  dark:       #222, 
  purple:     #663399 
);

```

```html
<ion-content padding> 
  <button ion-fab color="different">FAB</button> 
</ion-content>

color=different to the FAB. We will be using this variable name to apply styles.
```

```html
$colors: ( 
  primary:    red, 
  secondary:  #32db64, 
  danger:     #f53d3d, 
  light:      #f4f4f4, 
  dark:       #222, 
  purple:     #663399, 
  different: ( 
    base: #4CAF50, 
    contrast: #F44336 
  ) 
);

```

```html
<ion-content padding> 
  <button ion-fab color="different">FAB</button> 
  <label>This is a label that looks different from the one on Contact Page</label> 
</ion-content>

```

```html
<ion-content> 
    <label>This is a label that looks different from the one on About Page</label> 
</ion-content>

```
